name: Magna Carta 2
description:
Magna Carta 2 is a RPG game developed by Softmax. It came out on 06-08-2009. Bandai Namco Entertainment published the game. The game is rated as "Exceptional" on RAWG.
You can play Magna Carta 2 on Xbox 360. You can purchase the game on Xbox 360 Store.
Koji Kumakura (Senior), Toshihiro Nada (Executive), Yoshihisa Kanesaka and Young-Gee Cho produced the game. It was directed by Gramcat (Art), Kyung-jin Lee (Character), Sung-woon Jang (Sound/Music) and Yeon-Kyu Choi. It was scored by Sung-Woon Jang.
